thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Terry

author: Terry
title: Terry
text:
As a landlord with a number of investment properties (13) Nelson Alexander won the business over ten years ago in a competitive bid and has proved to be extremely reliable and professional with their advice.
Anthony Gentile took up the portfolio from the start and he has continued to manage it for me.
It means a lot when you can ring the agent and he instantly knows about the property, its history, tenants and condition. Low turnover of rental managers is a real factor in their favour.
Wise advice has kept the tenants stable, the condition of the property under continual review and the rents competitive.
